short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is designed to improve critical thinking skills by providing a list of questions to use in a discussions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is designed to help you improve your critical thinking skills by providing a list of questions that you can use in a discussions to deepen and balance your understanding. Simply install the extension, click on a question from the list and paste it into a discussion on social media or with an AI chatbot like ChatGPT. You'll be surprised what you'll learn!
